name: Enslave
window: When you gain control of a planet
windowEffect: Place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

name: Dominate
window: After you commit ground forces to a planet controlled by another player
windowEffect: That player must destroy 1 of their ground forces on that planet.

name: Seamless Integration
window: At the start of the Status phase
windowEffect: you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex that contains no other player's units, resolve invasion on that planet.

name: Void Tap
window: After you activate a system that contains no planets

name: Dark Weaver
window: When you explore a frontier token
windowEffect: You may draw 1 additional card; choose 1 to resolve and discard the rest

name: Abyssal Propagation
window: After you perform a tactical action,
windowEffect: you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcements in a system that contains no other players units.

name: Creeping Shades
window: At the start of space combat
windowEffect: if your opponent has a control token on one of your ships, you may return any number of control tokens from your faction sheet to replace one of their matching ship types with one from your reinforcements.

name: Silent Growth
window: At the start of the agenda phase,
windowEffect: For each other player you may spend influence equal to the cost of one non-fighter ship type with a cost of 4 or less to place one of their control tokens onto that ship type on your faction sheet.

name: Tomb Worlds
permanentEffect: For each planet that contains one of your space docks, increase its influence value by 2.

name: Protocols
window: At the start of the Strategy phase,
windowEffect: Exhaust all Active Protocols, and remove them from your faction sheet. Then, choose two unexhausted Protocols, and set them Active by placing them face up on your faction sheet.

name: Machine Cult
permanentEffect: During setup place the 2 Mechikide mech tokens in your reinforcements. The Mechikide unit tokens are additional units of their type.

name: Angelic Hosts
permanentEffect: During setup, take the 2 additional Saeraphyme faction agents and place them next to your faction sheet; you have 3 agents.

name: Celestial Being
permanentEffect: Your units ignore the effects of anomalies.
